member.name: T:VectSharp.Raster.Raster
member.summary: Contains methods to render a page to a PNG image.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Raster.Raster.SaveAsPNG(VectSharp.Page,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Render the page to a PNG file.
member.param: The to render.
The full path to the file to save. If it exists, it will be overwritten.
The scale to be used when rasterising the page. This will determine the width and height of the image file.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Raster.Raster.SaveAsPNG(VectSharp.Page,System.IO.Stream,System.Double)
member.summary: Render the page to a PNG stream.
member.param: The to render.
The stream to which the PNG data will be written.
The scale to be used when rasterising the page. This will determine the width and height of the image file.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Raster.Raster.Rasterise(VectSharp.Graphics,VectSharp.Rectangle,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Rasterise a region of a object.
member.param: The object that will be rasterised.
The region of the that will be rasterised.
The scale at which the image will be rendered.
Whether the resulting image should be interpolated or not when it is drawn on another surface.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Raster.Raster.SaveAsRawBytes(VectSharp.Page,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Double)
member.summary: Render the page to raw pixel data, in 32bpp RGBA format.
member.param: The to render.
The scale to be used when rasterising the page. This will determine the width and height of the image.
The width of the rendered image.
The height of the rendered image.
The size in bytes of the raw pixel data.
member.returns: A containing a pointer to the raw pixel data, stored in unmanaged memory. Dispose this object to release the unmanaged memory.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Raster.Raster.SaveAsAnimatedPNG(VectSharp.Animation,System.IO.Stream,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,VectSharp.AnimatedPNG.InterframeCompression)
member.summary: Saves the animation to a stream in animated PNG format.
member.param: The animation to export.
The stream on which the animated PNG will be written.
The scale at which the animation will be rendered.
The target frame rate of the animation, in frames-per-second (fps). This is capped by the animated PNG specification at 90 fps.

A scaling factor that will be applied to all durations in the animation. Values greater than 1 slow down the animation, values smaller than 1 accelerate it. Note that this does not affect the frame rate of the animation.
The kind of compression that will be used to reduce file size. Note that if the animation has a transparent background, no compression can be performed, and the value of this parameter is ignored.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Raster.Raster.SaveAsAnimatedPNG(VectSharp.Animation,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,VectSharp.AnimatedPNG.InterframeCompression)
member.summary: Saves the animation to an animated PNG file.
member.param: The animation to export.
The output file to create.
The scale at which the animation will be rendered.
The target frame rate of the animation, in frames-per-second (fps). This is capped by the animated PNG specification at 90 fps.

A scaling factor that will be applied to all durations in the animation. Values greater than 1 slow down the animation, values smaller than 1 accelerate it. Note that this does not affect the frame rate of the animation.
The kind of compression that will be used to reduce file size. Note that if the animation has a transparent background, no compression can be performed, and the value of this parameter is ignored.
